revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:Polyobj_RotateLeft}} {{special|2|po, speed, angle|Polyobject|RotateLeft}}
Rotates a polyobject left through the specified angle. If ''angle'' is 255, then the polyobject will rotate continuously and never stop.
* ''po'': polyobj to rotate * ''speed'': how quickly the polyobj should rotate * ''angle'': [[Definitions#Byte_Angles|byte angle]] to rotate the polyobj through
==See Also==
* [[Polyobj_OR_RotateLeft]] * [[Polyobj_RotateRight]] * [[PolyObjects]]
== External links == *[http://www.mediafire.com/download/9d8bbwakmdco4ub/poly-rotate.WAD Example map ]
